definition: able to move freely in all directions
details:
adjective
- able to move freely in all directions
= example: able to move freely in all directions
- competent in many areas and able to turn with ease from one thing to another
= example: competent in many areas and able to turn with ease from one thing to another
- changeable or inconstant
= example: changeable or inconstant
- having great diversity or variety
= synonyms: various
